description: Absolent Group AB engages in the development and manufacture of filtration technology for industrial process air. The company is headquartered in Lidkoeping, Vastra Gotalands and currently employs 412 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2014-10-16. The firm develops solutions for cleaning process air in different industries. The Company’s air cleaning solutions aim to help production companies to provide clean air to their employees, reduce energy costs and support the productivity. Absolent Air Care operates production facilities in Sweden, the United Kingdom, Germany, Canada and Estonia. The Group has operations in Finland, France, Netherlands, Hong Kong, India, Japan, China, Norway, Switzerland, Sweden, Germany and USA. The firm operates through six market segments; machining, metal fumes, commercial kitchen ventilation, food processing, heavy industry and dust bulk handling.
naics: Ventilation, Heating, Air-Conditioning, and Commercial Refrigeration Equipment Manufacturing
name: Absolent Air Care Group AB
